message: I'm feeling generous, but let's not waste any more time with inflation eating away at our potential gains.
Meet me in the middle, time is money
Alice, let's be realistic. We're losing money with every passing minute. This is a fair offer considering the time constraint.
Come on, Bob, we're both losing here. Split the difference
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome at this point. Take it or leave it.
